analysis.description:
ST20Token.transferRequestStatus (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#291-294) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- requestTransfer (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#515-524)
	- batchRequestTransfer (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#525-547)
	- fullTransferRequest (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#550-561)
	- batchFullTransferRequest (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#561-586)
	- getTransferRequestStatus (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol:
	Contract ST20Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#410-411)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ST20Token.name (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#265-266) shadows:
	- ERC20.name (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#34-35)

ST20Token.symbol (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#268-270) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#35)

ST20Token.decimals (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#270) shadows:
	- ERC20.decimals (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#35)

ST20Token.multiTransfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- kycVerification.isVerified(_to[_interator]) == false (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#505-506)

Reentrancy in ST20Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#474-480):
	External calls:
	- kycVerification.isVerified(_to) == false (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#478-479)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/22/0xff7ed06a93a96ff122eeaf333b9cac321fdd5ed9.sol#480)
